issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Add example for running SQL against Parquet
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6271](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6271). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
DataFusion has an example for running SQL against a CSV file but does not have an example showing how to do the same against a Parquet file.

There are unit tests for Parquet that could be used as the basis for an example.

Also see related story ARROW-6272.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6271?focusedCommentId=16914708) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 5161
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/5161>
